content: I was just thinking... I love you more than pizza, and that's saying something, {wife_name}! Forever yours.
Hey {wife_name}, You're the WiFi to my laptop - I can't function without you! Have a wonderful day!
Good morning, {wife_name}! Marriage tip: I'm always wrong, and I'm totally fine with that. You're the best!
Hey {wife_name}, You're the reason I smile... and also the reason I need coffee. Miss you!
Thinking of you and I love you even when you steal all the blankets, {wife_name}. You're amazing!
Hey {wife_name}, You're my favorite weirdo, and I wouldn't have it any other way! Miss you!
Sweetheart, Thanks for putting up with me. I know I'm a lot! You make me so happy!
Good morning, {wife_name}! You're the cheese to my macaroni - we're better together! You make me so happy!
Just wanted you to know that I love you more than Netflix, and that's a BIG deal. Have a wonderful day!
Hey {wife_name}, You had me at 'I'll cook dinner tonight.' Can't wait to see you later!
Marriage is just texting 'What do you want for dinner?' until we die. Forever yours.
{wife_name}, You're my favorite notification on my phone, {wife_name}! Can't wait to see you later!
Random thought: I promise to always let you have the last slice of pizza... maybe. You make me so happy!
Hey {wife_name}, You're stuck with me forever. Sorry, no refunds! Can't wait to see you later!
Just a note to say I love you even when you're hangry. You're amazing!
Just a note to say You complete me... especially my sentences. Miss you!
Just a note to say Thanks for laughing at my jokes even when they're terrible. Love you!
Sweetheart, I'd share my fries with you, and that's true love. Have a wonderful day!
Sweetheart, You're the avocado to my toast - expensive but totally worth it! You're amazing!
Hey beautiful, I love you more than I love sleeping in, {wife_name}. Miss you!
Good morning, {wife_name}! You're my favorite human to be weird with. Can't wait to see you later!
Just because I can: Marriage is just asking each other 'did you hear that noise?' forever. Thinking of you always.
I was just thinking... I'd let you have the TV remote. Sometimes. Thinking of you always.
I was just thinking... You're the only person I'd share my snacks with, {wife_name}. Miss you!
Just wanted you to know that Thanks for pretending my dad jokes are funny! Miss you!
Hope you're having a great day! I love you more than my phone battery loves dying at 20%. You're amazing!
Random thought: You're my emergency contact and my emergency snack supplier. You're the best!
My love, Marriage: because who else would put up with this? Can't wait to see you later!
Just wanted you to know that You make my heart do that thing hearts do. You know, beat. Forever yours.
My love, I'd pause my video game for you. That's love. You make me so happy!
Thinking of you and You're the reason I smile and the reason I have gray hairs! Love you!
Random thought: Thanks for choosing me when you could have had literally anyone else. You're amazing!
Just a note to say I love you like a fat kid loves cake. Wait, I'm the fat kid. XOXO
I was just thinking... You're my favorite hello and my hardest goodbye, {wife_name}. Thinking of you always.
Quick reminder: If loving you was a crime, I'd be serving a life sentence. Love you!
My love, You're the only person who knows how weird I really am. You make me so happy!
I'd share my dessert with you. THAT'S how much I love you. XOXO
